title: 611A.203 DOMESTIC FATALITY REVIEW TEAMS.

variables.name: case.prosecutionStatus
variables.description: The status of the prosecution for the case under review.

variables.name: relationship.type
variables.description: The type of relationship between the alleged perpetrator and the victim.

consequences: The case may be reviewed by the domestic fatality review team.

variables.name: team.memberCount
variables.description: The number of members in the domestic fatality review team.

variables.name: team.diversity
variables.description: The commitment to diversity in the team.

variables.name: team.professionalExperience
variables.description: The relevance of professional experience among team members.

variables.name: team.members.medicalExaminer
variables.description: Presence of a medical examiner in the team.

variables.name: team.members.judicialCourtOfficer
variables.description: Presence of a judicial court officer in the team.

variables.name: team.members.countyCityAttorney
variables.description: Presence of a county and city attorney in the team.

variables.name: team.members.publicDefender
variables.description: Presence of a public defender in the team.

variables.name: team.members.countySheriff
variables.description: Presence of a county sheriff in the team.

variables.name: team.members.peaceOfficer
variables.description: Presence of a peace officer in the team.

variables.name: team.members.familyCourtServices
variables.description: Presence of a representative from family court services in the team.

variables.name: team.members.departmentOfCorrections
variables.description: Presence of a representative from the Department of Corrections in the team.

variables.name: team.members.physician
variables.description: Presence of a physician familiar with domestic violence issues in the team.

variables.name: team.members.districtCourtAdministration
variables.description: Presence of a representative from district court administration in the team.

variables.name: team.members.domesticAbuseServiceCenter
variables.description: Presence of a representative from the domestic abuse service center in the team.

variables.name: team.members.publicCitizenRepresentative
variables.description: Presence of a public citizen representative in the team.

variables.name: team.members.mentalHealthProfessional
variables.description: Presence of a mental health professional in the team.

variables.name: team.members.domesticViolenceAdvocates
variables.description: Presence of domestic violence advocates in the team.

variables.name: team.members.shelterWorkers
variables.description: Presence of shelter workers in the team.

consequences: The domestic fatality review team is properly constituted.

variables.name: team.advocatesCount
variables.description: The number of domestic violence advocates or shelter workers in the team.

variables.name: team.advocatesDiversity
variables.description: Diversity among the advocates, including minority representation.

variables.name: team.advocatesRotation
variables.description: Rotation of advocates to include community representation.

consequences: The team meets the requirements for advocate representation.

variables.name: review.dataAccess
variables.description: Access to necessary data for the review.

variables.name: review.confidentiality
variables.description: Maintenance of confidentiality during the review.

variables.name: review.immunity
variables.description: Immunity granted to team members and contributors.

consequences: The review process is compliant with legal requirements.

variables.name: report.issued
variables.description: Frequency of the report issuance.

variables.name: report.content
variables.description: Content of the report.

variables.name: report.distribution
variables.description: Distribution of the report to relevant authorities.
